summary: Developer portfolio website for Computer Science student applying for college placements and software internships. Modern, minimal design with professional animations and recruiter-friendly layout.
architectural_notes: Modern, minimal UI with neutral base + one accent color palette
High-quality typography using Inter/Poppins style fonts
Smooth scroll-based fade-in + slide-up animations throughout
Subtle hover effects and micro-interactions on interactive elements
Professional animations that are fast and non-distracting
Light or dark theme with excellent contrast
Responsive design optimized for recruiter viewing experience

existing_features.title: Create a Hero section with name display 'Aspiring Software Developer | Computer Science Student', a short introduction paragraph focused on problem-solving and building real-world applications, and two call-to-action buttons labeled 'View Projects' and 'Download Resume'. Implement subtle entrance animations (fade-in + slide-up) for text and buttons on page load.

Create an About Me section with a concise, professional bio of 5-6 lines that focuses on technical curiosity, learning mindset, and career goals. Implement gentle fade-in animation that triggers when the section scrolls into view.

Create a Skills section with categorized skill groups: Languages, Frontend, Backend, Databases, and Tools. Display skills in a clean grid layout with hover micro-interactions (subtle scale or color change on hover).

Create a Projects section with professional project cards. Each card must display: project title, 1-2 line problem-focused description, tech stack used, GitHub link button, and Live Demo button. Implement hover animations on cards (slight scale up and shadow enhancement). Emphasize functionality and impact in descriptions.
Create a Resume section with a clear button to download resume (PDF format). Implement professional styling with hover feedback (color change, scale, or shadow).
Create a Contact section displaying an email address, GitHub and LinkedIn icon links, and a simple contact form. Implement subtle animations on form interaction (focus states, input animations).

Implement smooth fade-in and slide-up animations on scroll for all major sections (About Me, Skills, Projects, Contact). Ensure animations are triggered when sections enter the viewport and feel professional and fast.

Implement subtle hover effects throughout the site: buttons should have scale or color transitions, cards should lift slightly or enhance shadows, and navigation items should display animated underline or highlight effects. Ensure smooth page scrolling behavior.

Apply a modern, minimal design system with a neutral base color palette plus one accent color. Use high-quality typography (Inter or Poppings-style font), balanced whitespace, consistent spacing throughout, and excellent contrast for readability. Implement either a light or dark theme with professional polish.

Establish a modern, sophisticated visual theme with a minimal aesthetic that conveys professionalism suitable for tech recruiters. The design should feel premium yet approachable, with a cohesive color scheme, typography hierarchy, and spacing system that creates visual harmony across all sections. Avoid blue and purple color schemes unless explicitly requested.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with name, title, intro, and CTA buttons with entrance animations
About Me section with professional bio and fade-in animation
Skills section with categorized grid layout and hover micro-interactions
Projects section with professional cards, tech stack, links, and hover animations
Resume download button with professional styling
Contact section with email, social links, and contact form with animations
